titleStmt.title: To the supream authority of England the Commons assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of diverse wel-affected weomen of the cities of London and Westminster, the borrough of Southwark, hamblets, and places adjacent. Affecters and approvers of the petition of Sept. 11. 1648.

To the supream authority of England the Commons assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of diverse wel-affected weomen of the cities of London and Westminster, the borrough of Southwark, hamblets, and places adjacent. Affecters and approvers of the petition of Sept. 11. 1648.

notesStmt.note: Also published in the same year with title: To the supream authority of England the Commons assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of divers well-affected women.
Creased and stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
